>In my opinion i think NA players and players from all around the world like sports related skins and nothing is more American then American Football itself

The question does arise though, why not a sport that is more globally popular like Cricket or Rugby, or even the most popular sport in the world, real Football. Handegg skins would have abysmal sales on servers that weren't NA unless they were super generic, if they had anything too related to the sport people outside of America just wouldn't care.

Football skins are an easy win however since it's the most popular sport globally. Football's international popularity is similar to what Handegg's is in America except on a global scale. When you consider that EUW is somewhere around twice as large as NA as a server it's just a more logical sport. It would sell far better on 2 of the 3 large servers.

Football skins are just always going to sell better even if they already exist when you consider this.
http://i.imgur.com/2s84x.png

Yeah yeah yeah. Heard that tired old argument before. There are already two NA skins in statue of liberty Karthas and Uncle Sam Ryze. And if they were 750 as the op suggest I don't think Riot would be too concerned over how well they sell.

The fact is that Riot could make Handegg skins for almost no profit or they could seize on an easy buck making Football skins. It's simple to see that there would be an overall preference towards Football skins when 2 of the big 3 servers are located in regions where Football is popular as well as several of the smaller servers. (BR, TR, RU ect.)

>There are already two NA skins in statue of liberty Karthas and Uncle Sam Ryze.

When those two skins were made the majority of the playerbase was American. Both skins were released on 4/7/2010, the EUW server wasn't released until [13/7/2010.](http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Servers) You are comparing a completely different time here, at that time a larger portion of players would have been interested in these skins.

Now we've reashed the point where people expect more from skins and NA is no longer the largest server with both EUW and KR being bigger than it. It makes far less sense to invest resources into skins for just NA now than it did in 2010.

Yep and Riot also does Chinese New Years skins every year as well. Tell me how big of  a holiday that is on all the other major regions. Doesn't seem to hurt those skins sells all that much. 

INB4 excuse for how that's different even though its a skin for something that is only celebrated in one region.

Firstly China is a bigger "server" (collection of) than NA. Secondly Chinese new-year is an event that is celebrated outside of China. In addition the skins are usually generic. The Lunar reveal skins normally just look Chinese inspired. They don't really take that much inspiration from New Year itself.

I don't think you understand this but no-one outside of America really gives a fuck about American Football. I can honestly say that Chinese New Year is far more interesting than American crap-sports to me.

>Tell me how big of a holiday that is on all the other major regions. 

Probably 5-10x bigger than the Superbowl when you consider Asian migrant populations.

Lol you're way to salty to be taken serious. Either a bad troll or legitimately butt hurt, just stay in your own little world K. If Riot can sell Chinese New Years skins than they can sell an American Football skin. And no people around the world don't care for the Chinese new year the way you make them out to, that's why its called the Chinese New Year.

I get your point. Football skins are already around and you dont see many of them around being used. The reason is on the football or soccer theme you dont get to do much with the skins appearance. And believe me i am an indian from kolkata and anyone who knows about these to places can tell you football is kolkata's religion and cricket is india's religion. These 2 sports are what dominate my country. But the thing is you cant do much about the appearance of the skins of these sports. But with american football .... just look at the gear man and the balls shape things that are completely distinct from other sports and the look awesome. Skins are all about looking awesome.

>I get your point. Football skins are already around and you dont see many of them around being used. 

For the most part I'd say that's because they're all limited skins that are at least two years old and honestly none of them are that good. You're also playing on the NA server, which is something to keep in mind. Personally I actually see Goalkeeper Maokai and Red Card TF quite a bit and I'd say I see the others about an average amount for limited skins and I'm not playing in a region where Football's super popular.

I just think that there's much less selling power behind Handegg than there is behind Football. If I had to take a bet about the next set of sport(ish) based skins coming up I'd say it will probably be something to do with the 2016 Rio Olympics.

It also probably doesn't matter if there's already ~10 Football skins, the potential profit margin for creating another is probably still way higher than a Handegg Skin.
